title: I Bought the Last One Apple Ever Made... - Apple XServe 3,1 Server
description: Check out Micro Centers Monitor Madness:  Shop ASUS VG27AQL1A 27 170Hz Gaming Monitor:   Power up your daily workflow with Setapp:   Apple used to make servers. For real. What were was the XServe like? What could it do? Why has the Mac Server gone the way of the iPod Touch?
